QuestionList.question: Openly admits and takes responsibility for the mistakes committed.
Takes feedback very constructively for future development.
Takes accountability for a team member's mistakes / faults and makes sure that it does not occur in future.
Strives towards delivering assignments undertaken to agreed deadlines with the team. Disciplined to finish on time without procrastinations
Proactive & Organized. Plan the work well in advance and rarely excuses for delays
Punctual to work meetings and appointments and have a clear objective
Delegates tasks responsibly. Empowers the team members
Motivates the team members to get the job done rather than impose  authority to accomplish tasks
Ready to take any kind of challenge and drive towards the change.
Demonstrates transperancy in the decision making process
Involves team members in the decision making process
Represents the team members and their challenges during the management decision making process
Gives priority to Company objectives and targets over departmental and personal targets.
Understands the link and importance of the individual, department KPIs towards the overall organizational performance.
Independently Commits to learn and upgrade knowledge / skills. Grows with the organization
Always Share knowledge and is concerned about developing fellow members.
Appreciates and utilizes the knowledge even he/she is a  junior team member.
Confident about the abilities and aware of his/her own limitations.
Supporting evidence for employee's leadership skills.
Supporting evidence for employee's  Decision Making skills.
